TypeSignature.Value: public abstract class TextReader : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit TextReader extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class TextReader Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class TextReader abstract : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable

summary.span: 代表可以讀取一連串連續字元的讀取器 (Reader)。

span.span: Represents a reader that can read a sequential series of characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是抽象基底類別和，其讀取的字元資料流和字串，分別。 is the abstract base class of and , which read characters from streams and strings, respectively. 若要開啟文字檔以供讀取指定的範圍的字元，或建立根據現有的資料流讀取器，請使用這些衍生的類別。Use these derived classes to open a text file for reading a specified range of characters, or to create a reader based on an existing stream. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用衍生自這個型別的任何類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using any type that derives from this type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 Dispose 和中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see Dispose and the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. ## Examples 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 類別衍生自，並提供從資料流讀取成員的實作。The class derives from and provides implementations of the members for reading from a stream. 下列範例示範如何使用讀取檔案中的所有字元方法。The following example shows how to read all the characters in a file by using the method. 會檢查每個字元之前加入的執行個體中的字元是否為字母、 數字或泛空白字元類別。It checks whether each character is a letter, digit, or white space before adding the character to an instance of the class. [!code-csharp[System.IO.StreamReader#42](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StreamReader/CS/example42.cs#42)] [!code-vb[System.IO.StreamReader#42](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.StreamReader/VB/example42.vb#42)]

para.span: 在衍生的類別必須至少實作和方法來進行有用的執行個體的。

span.span: A derived class must minimally implement the and methods to make a useful instance of .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在衍生類別中使用這個建構函式。Use this constructor for derived classes.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Close ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Close ()
public: virtual void Close();

summary.span: 關閉 並釋放任何與 關聯的系統資源。

span.span: Closes the and releases any system resources associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項實作`Close`呼叫方法並將其傳遞`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method and passes it a `true` value. 排清的文字讀取器不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫`Close`。Flushing the text reader will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Close`. 設定屬性`true`表示從緩衝區資料流，清除資料，但並不會清除編碼器狀態。Setting the property to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 這可讓編碼器將保存其狀態 （部分字元），讓它可以正確編碼字元的下一個區塊。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 這種情況下會影響 UTF8 及 UTF7 其中編碼某些字元才編碼器接收或多個相鄰的字元。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can be encoded only after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. > [!NOTE] > 在衍生類別中，不會覆寫方法。In derived classes, do not override the method. 相反地，覆寫方法，將程式碼，以便釋放資源。Instead, override the method to add code for releasing resources.

summary.span: 釋放由 物件使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 釋放由 物件使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's method.

MemberSignature.Value: protected virtual void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: virtual void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. 根據預設，這個方法會指定`disposing`參數做為`true`。By default, this method specifies the `disposing` parameter as `true`. 指定`disposing`參數做為`false`。 specifies the `disposing` parameter as `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫這個方法，小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding this method, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需如何實作這個方法的詳細資訊，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement this method, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

summary.span: 提供沒有可從中讀取之資料的 。

span.span: Provides a with no data to read from.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從讀取文字讀取器讀取類似從資料流結尾：Reading from the text reader is similar to reading from the end of a stream: - 和方法會傳回-1。The and methods return -1. - 方法會傳回零。The method returns zero. - 方法會傳回`null`。The method returns `null`. - 方法會傳回空字串。The method returns an empty string.

Public Overridable Function Peek () As Integer
public: virtual int Peek();

summary.span: 讀取下一個字元，而不會變更讀取器或字元來源的狀態。

span.span: Reads the next character without changing the state of the reader or the character source.

summary.span: 傳回下一個可用字元，而不會實際從讀取器讀取。

span.span: Returns the next available character without actually reading it from the reader.

returns.span: 整數，表示要讀取的下一個字元，如果沒有更多字元可供使用或讀取器不支援搜尋，則為 -1。

span.span: An integer representing the next character to be read, or -1 if no more characters are available or the reader does not support seeking.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會傳回整數值，以判斷是否發生檔案或另一項錯誤的結尾。The method returns an integer value in order to determine whether the end of the file, or another error has occurred. 這可讓使用者能夠先檢查 是否傳回的值為-1 的之前先將它轉換型別。This allows a user to first check if the returned value is -1 before casting it to a type. 目前的位置不會變更這項作業。The current position of the is not changed by this operation. 傳回的值為-1，如果沒有更多字元可供使用。The returned value is -1 if no more characters are available. 預設的實作會傳回 -1。The default implementation returns -1. 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 如需使用方法，請參閱方法。For an example of using the method, see the method.

span.span: The is closed.
An I/O error occurs.

summary.span: 從文字讀取器讀取資料。

span.span: Reads data from the text reader.

Public Overridable Function Read () As Integer
public: virtual int Read();

summary.span: 自文字讀取器讀取下一個字元，並將字元位置前移一個字元。

span.span: Reads the next character from the text reader and advances the character position by one character.

returns.span: 文字讀取器的下一個字元；如果不再有字元可供使用，則為 -1。

span.span: The next character from the text reader, or -1 if no more characters are available.

returns.span: 預設的實作會傳回 -1。

span.span: The default implementation returns -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 如需使用方法，請參閱方法。For an example of using the method, see the method.

span.span: The maximum number of characters to read.

param.span: 如果指定的字元數讀入緩衝區之前，便到達讀取器末端，則方法會返回。

span.span: If the end of the reader is reached before the specified number of characters is read into the buffer, the method returns.

summary.span: 從目前讀取器讀取指定的最大字元數目，並從指定的索引開始將資料寫入緩衝區。

span.span: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current reader and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.

returns.span: 已經讀取的字元數目。

span.span: The number of characters that have been read.

returns.span: 數目將小於或等於 ，取決於資料是否在讀取器中可供使用。

span.span: The number will be less than or equal to , depending on whether the data is available within the reader.

returns.span: 如果不再有字元可供讀取時呼叫，這個方法傳回 0 (零)。

span.span: This method returns 0 (zero) if it is called when no more characters are left to read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回之後`count`讀取的字元或達到檔案結尾。This method returns after either `count` characters are read or the end of the file is reached. 是封鎖的版本，這個方法。 is a blocking version of this method. 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 如需使用方法，請參閱方法。For an example of using the method, see the method.

summary.span: 從目前的文字讀取器非同步讀取指定的最大字元數目，並從指定的索引開始將資料寫入緩衝區。

span.span: Reads a specified maximum number of characters from the current text reader asynchronously and writes the data to a buffer, beginning at the specified index.

returns.span: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: 參數的值會包含讀取至緩衝區的位元組總數。

span.span: The value of the parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.

returns.span: 如果目前可供使用的位元組數目少於所要求的數目，結果值可能會小於所要求的位元組數目，或者如果已經到達文字末端，則可能為 0（零）。

span.span: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the text has been reached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在工作完成之後指定的字元數目`count`參數讀取或檔案結尾為止。The task completes after either the number of characters specified by the `count` parameter are read or the end of the file is reached. 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 如需使用方法，請參閱方法。For an example of using the method, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基本的文字讀取器的位置前移成已讀取的字元數`buffer`。The position of the underlying text reader is advanced by the number of characters that were read into `buffer`. 方法會封鎖直到`count`讀取字元，或已經讀取所有字元。The method blocks until either `count` characters are read, or all characters have been read. 這是封鎖版本。This is a blocking version of .

summary.span: 自文字讀取器讀取一行字元，並將資料以字串傳回。

span.span: Reads a line of characters from the text reader and returns the data as a string.

returns.span: 讀取器中的下一行；如果已經讀取所有字元，則為 。

span.span: The next line from the reader, or if all characters have been read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一條線定義為一串字元後面接著歸位字元 (0x000d)、 換行字元 (0x000a)，以歸位換行字元，後面接著，或資料流結尾標記。A line is defined as a sequence of characters followed by a carriage return (0x000d), a line feed (0x000a), a carriage return followed by a line feed, , or the end-of-stream marker. 所傳回的字串沒有結尾的歸位字元或換行字元。The string that is returned does not contain the terminating carriage return or line feed. 傳回值是`null`如果已到達輸入資料流的結尾。The return value is `null` if the end of the input stream has been reached. 在方法擲回例外狀況，在基礎讀取器的位置進階的方法無法讀取的字元，但已經已讀入至內部的字元數緩衝區是捨棄。If the method throws an exception, the reader's position in the underlying is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters that were already read into the internal buffer are discarded. 無法變更資料流中讀取器的位置，因為已讀取的字元無法復原，並可重新初始化來存取物件。Because the position of the reader in the stream cannot be changed, the characters that were already read are unrecoverable and can be accessed only by reinitializing the object. 如果是未知的資料流的初始位置，或資料流不支援搜尋，基礎也必須重新初始化。If the initial position within the stream is unknown or the stream does not support seeking, the underlying also needs to be reinitialized. 若要避免這種情況，並產生穩定的程式碼，您應該使用讀取方法，並存放區中預先配置的緩衝區的字元。To avoid such a situation and produce robust code you should use the method and store the read characters in a preallocated buffer. 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 如需使用方法，請參閱方法。For an example of using the method, see the method.

span.span: An I/O error occurs.

exception.span: 沒有足夠記憶體可為傳回的字串配置緩衝區。

span.span: There is insufficient memory to allocate a buffer for the returned string.
The is closed.

exception.span: 下一行中的字元數大於 。

span.span: The number of characters in the next line is larger than

Public Overridable Function ReadLineAsync () As Task(Of String)
public: virtual System::Threading::Tasks::Task<System::String ^> ^ ReadLineAsync();

summary.span: 非同步讀取一行字元，並將資料以字串傳回。

span.span: Reads a line of characters asynchronously and returns the data as a string.

returns.span: 表示非同步讀取作業的工作。

span.span: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.

returns.span: 參數的值會包含文字讀取器中的下一行；如果已經讀取所有字元，則為 。

span.span: The value of the parameter contains the next line from the text reader, or is if all of the characters have been read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 如需使用方法，請參閱方法。For an example of using the method, see the method. 如果目前代表所傳回的標準輸入資料流屬性，同步而不是以非同步方式執行方法。If the current represents the standard input stream returned by the property, the method executes synchronously rather than asynchronously.

The text reader has been disposed.

summary.span: 讀取從目前位置到文字讀取器末端的所有字元，並將它們以單一字串傳回。

span.span: Reads all characters from the current position to the end of the text reader and returns them as one string.

returns.span: 字串，包含從目前位置到文字讀取器結尾的所有字元。

span.span: A string that contains all characters from the current position to the end of the text reader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在方法擲回例外狀況，在基礎讀取器的位置進階的方法無法讀取的字元，但已經已讀入至內部的字元數緩衝區是捨棄。If the method throws an exception, the reader's position in the underlying is advanced by the number of characters the method was able to read, but the characters that were already read into the internal buffer are discarded. 無法變更資料流中讀取器的位置，因為已讀取的字元無法復原，並可重新初始化來存取。Because the position of the reader in the stream cannot be changed, the characters that were already read are unrecoverable and can be accessed only by reinitializing the . 如果是未知的資料流的初始位置，或資料流不支援搜尋，基礎也必須重新初始化。If the initial position within the stream is unknown or the stream does not support seeking, the underlying also needs to be reinitialized. 若要避免這種情況，並產生穩定的程式碼，您應該使用讀取方法，並存放區中預先配置的緩衝區的字元。To avoid such a situation and produce robust code you should use the method and store the read characters in a preallocated buffer. 類別是抽象類別。The class is an abstract class. 因此，您的程式碼中不必將它執行個體化。Therefore, you do not instantiate it in your code. 如需使用方法，請參閱方法。For an example of using the method, see the method.

summary.span: 在指定的 內建立安全執行緒的包裝函式。

span.span: Creates a thread-safe wrapper around the specified .

returns.span: 安全執行緒的 。

span.span: A thread-safe .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 目前的方法會傳回指定周圍包裝的類別執行個體，並由多個執行緒會限制存取。The current method returns a class that wraps around the specified instance and restricts access to it by multiple threads. 傳回包裝函式的所有讀取將會都是安全執行緒。All reads from the returned wrapper will be thread safe.
